attributes.additional_details:
Please sign our petition to get the UK Government to widen the current childcare sacrifice scheme to become the World's 1st Save & Spend scheme.

You simply tell your boss how much you want to sacrifice each month from your wages.  From £50 up to £243 and that amount goes straight onto a pre-paid debit card for you to spend just after payday.

The great thing is the amount you saved is Tax & NI free - saving a 20% taxpayer up to £933 per year.

Plus participation stores also offer a 10% discount giving savers £1224 Of Free shopping each year!

Over 90% of tax payers can benefit from this. High Street's can be thriving again and 1000's of new jobs created.

Please help us help you!  Sign today and tell your friends to sign too.

Together we can make it happen!
